pr_title: Add JSON related fixes to RESTEasy Reactive

timeline.message: Use media type as suffix as subtype for locating readers if necessary

timeline.bodyText: In which case can this be null? It seems a bit counter intuitive.
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
It can be null in two legitimate cases:

An exception is thrown before the target method is reached
A request filters aborts the processing
replies.author: geoand
